H0.text: In the human body, what is stored in adipose tissue. Water

H1.text: In the human body, what is stored in adipose tissue. Glycogen

H2.text: In the human body, what is stored in adipose tissue. Proteins

H3.text: In the human body, what is stored in adipose tissue. Fat

A4.text: Its main role is to store energy in the form of lipids

A5.text: However, its main function is to be a reserve of lipids
